JobFullDesc: Are you passionate aboutproviding a first-class digital enablement experience to Microsoft’s most impactful organization?We are seeking a high energy program manager to drive results and help lead our growing digital maturity services practice to maximize the investment and impact of the world’s mission-based organizations.  Microsoft’s Tech for Social Impact is a full industry vertical team that works directly with nonprofits and the United Nations. The team brings together the company’s donation and grants programs, commercial sales efforts, partner ecosystem programs, and technology solutions to empower nonprofits globally to address the world’s most pressing needs. The Strategy and Solutions team within Tech for Social Impact leads cloud strategy, go-to-market planning, and solution delivery working with nonprofits and the United Nations to maximize their social impact through the power of Microsoft platforms. We are a mission-driven organization that balances social impact with the need to maintain a sustainable business model for how Microsoft scales digital transformation across the nonprofit sector; and are looking for a passionate, motivated, technically sound individual to influence and validate grantees that will help our nonprofit customers be more efficient, more effective, and deliver greater impact.  Success for this role will be supporting the practice leader to successfully build out and execute a strong and detailed business model, along with overseeing strategic engagements. You
